Name: FukTopia 3
About the game: FukTopia 3 is a frantic post apocalyptic top-down shooter for 1-4 players Randomly Generated Levels Each level is random so you will be faced with unique levels each time you play. The fast-paced action is spiced up with a beautiful art found throughout the randomly generated levels each time you play. Gameplay The player enter into a random generated level and need to clear the entire level from enemies to go to the next level. Features - Challenging multiplayer online - Every game is different - random levels - Amazing Pixel Art
